price: Enti wͻbͻͻ pͻ paa, na Yεn nso Yεbͻͻ pͻ paa wͻ aberε a na wͻnnim.
arabic: وَمَكَرُواْ مَكۡرٗا وَمَكَرۡنَا مَكۡرٗا وَهُمۡ لَا يَشۡعُرُونَ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: wamakarū makran wamakarnā makran wahum lā yashʿurūna
